title: Armonia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, Bolivian
description: Vegetarian lunch buffet restaurant in a peaceful setting. Buffet includes soup, salad, around 5 hot dishes, dessert, and tea. Price around BS26. Owner produces his own organic vegetables. Most items are vegan suitable. Please send HappyCow a link to the correct map location on Google maps- thanks.
